text: Plants have multiple different properties, one of them is the damage Effect.
$(br2)Effects are diverse, doing continuous damage, slowing down Zombies, dealing more damage to specific types, etc.
$(br2)Here's a list of all of the different effects:
$(br2)Chill
$(br2)Chill slows down Zombies, giving plants more time to finish them off.
$(br2)Damage done by zombies is halved.
$(br2)Moves based on animation like Gargantuar's smash are slowed down by half.
$(br2)Machines can't be Chilled.
$(br2)Frozen
$(br2)Frozen completely stops Zombies in their tracks.
$(br2)Frozen Zombies can't attack.
$(br2)Frozen Zombies can't do their abilities.
$(br2)Frozen instantly kills zombies that swim and aren't Gargantuars and flying Zombies.
$(br2)Machines can't be Frozen.
$(br2)Fire
$(br)Sets Zombies on fire, unless they are wet. Wet and Zombies immune to Fire prevent Fire Splash or don't take damage from it, halving direct damage as well.
$(br)Zombies on fire take 1 DMG/sec if they are not being attacked.
$(br)Zombies get Warm, which prevents Chill from being applied.
Thaws Chilled or Frozen Zombies.
$(br)Deals double the damage against Paper.
$(br2)Water
$(br2)Wet Zombies, extinguishing and preventing Fire for a short time.
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Paper and Stone.
$(br2)Wind
$(br2)Knocks back Flying Zombies that don't have protection.
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Paper, and half against Stone.
$(br2)Electricity
$(br)Chains damage between Zombies, the chain damage is the base damage. Chain's range is by the Electric Radius, that is based on the location of the hit Zombie.
$(br)Electricity chains by the number of Electric Chains. Metallic doesn't count towards the number. Plastic/Rubber cost 2 Electric Chains when hit.
$(br)Electric damage doubles if the target is Wet.
$(br2)Stun
$(br2)Stun completely stops Zombies in their tracks for 0.5 seconds base, unless specified otherwise.
$(br2)Stunned Zombies can't attack.
$(br2)Stunned Zombies can't do their abilities.
$(br2)Covered and Machine Zombies can't be Stunned.
$(br2)Poison
$(br2)Deals continuous direct damage to the Zombie, ignoring armor.
$(br2)Deals 1.5 DMG/0.5sec.
$(br2)Can only be applied to Zombies with Flesh (default type).
$(br2)Acid
$(br2)Deals continuous damage to Metallic Zombies.
$(br2)Deals 8 DMG/0.5sec.
$(br2)Can only be applied to Metal.
$(br2)Bounce
$(br2)Knocks Zombies back. Small Zombies instantly die.
$(br2)Hypno
$(br2)Transforms the Zombie into a Hypnotized version of itself.
$(br2)Most of the time they have their abilities, save a few exceptions.
$(br2)Covered Zombies are immune to Hypnosis, Machines themselves can't be hypnotized, but the Zombie controlling them can.
$(br2)Magic
$(br2)Deals double the damage against Zombies without headgear and aren't Covered
$(br2)Sound
$(br2)Has a 25% chance to make the the projectile or other means of attack "critical", which increases the damage by 50%.
